description: Budget front-wheel drive sedan class C. The restyled version of the model was presented in the fall of 2016 at the auto show in Guangzhou, China.
overview: Although the changes are cosmetic, the Peugeot 301 has become more stylish and modern. The car received a different radiator grille, head optics of a different shape with integrated running lights, updated bumpers and rims. Changes in the appearance almost did not affect the overall dimensions of the Peugeot 301. The length has slightly changed - 4445 mm instead of the previous 4442 mm. The rest of the parameters remained unchanged: width - 1748 mm, height - 1466 mm, wheelbase - 2652 mm. The ground clearance is 165 mm, the front and rear overhangs are 819 and 974 mm, respectively.

specifications.name: Engine capacity(l):
specifications.hint: Engine capacity refers to the volume swept by all the pistons of an engine, within their bores, from the top to the bottom of their travel.

specifications.name: Horse power(hp):
specifications.hint: Horsepower (hp) is a unit of measurement of power, or the rate at which work is done, usually in reference to the output of engines or motors.

specifications.name: Torque(Nm):
specifications.hint: Torque is a twisting force that speaks to the engine's rotational force and measures how much of that twisting force is available when an engine exerts itself.
